sorcer.core

Interface Provider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Monitorable, Remote, Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SorcerNotifierProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseProvider, DataSpaceProvider, ExertMonitor, RemoteLoggerManager, ServiceCataloger, ServiceJobber, ServiceProvider, ServiceSpacer, ServiceTasker

    public interface Provider
extends Service, Monitorable, Remote
    This is an interface that defines how a provider interacts with other code the through the methods that are exposed. It extends Service, Monitorable, and Remote.
    See Also:
    Service, Monitorable, Remote
